lines: der se so kar uthee priya
amit kab ka uth chuka tha
arun ke saath subah kee sair karane chala gaya tha
veena tab tak apane kichan ka kaam nipata chukee thee
subah kee chaay peete samay veena ne use bataaya ki unakee dinacharya subah paanch baje shuru ho jaatee hai
saat baje tak subah ka naashta va din bhar ka khaana taiyaar karake vah bachchon ke saathasaath hee kaam par nikal jaatee hai
bachche chaar baje skool se lautate hain aur vah paanch baje aaphis se ghar aatee hai
arun peechhe se jyaadaatar ghar hee rahata hai
saptaah mein ekaadh baar hee use baahar jaana hota hai
shesh jo kuchh bhee kaam hai vah teleephon ke sahaare hee karata hai
priya arun kee kahaanee sunane ko itanee utsuk na thee use to apanee bahan ke pandrah varsho ka hisaab jaanane kee utsukata thee
usane dekha veena jaise raat vaalee veena nahin
ab kaaphee tarotaaja lag rahee hai
raat ko vah apanee priy bahan se milakar bhaavanaon ke aaveg ke saamane bandhee dikh rahee thee
ab veena jaise us aaveg se baahar aa chukee hai
aise mein priya ne seedhe shabdon ka prayog karate hue veena se kaha deedee jeejaajee ke saath koee kasht to nahin aapako
kasht kasht kaisa itana samay beet gaya
main aur arun ekadoosare ko ab pooree tarah se pahachaan chuke hain
bachche hain main unhee ke saath vyast rahatee hoon
veena ne sahaj bhaav se utar diya
naheennaheen mera matalab hain aapako jindagee ke in pandrah varsho mein kaisa laga priya ne doosare shabd prayog kie
vah apanee bahan ke beete dinon ko jaanana chaah rahee thee
veena ne tab kahana shuru kiya priya jeevan kee saarthakata to usee mein hai ki jo ho raha hota hai hamaare saath yadi ham usamen sukh hee khonje sukh hee dekhen to kuchh bhee bura nahee lagata
yahee meree aadat hai shuru se
main to apane beete dinon se kuchh seekhane ke kie kabheekabhaar yaad kar letee hoon unhen
aur ab mera ek poora parivaar ban gaya hai
bachche jaisejaise bade hote ja rahe hai mujhe yahee lagane laga hai ki maine ab sab sukh bhog lie hain
arun se shaadee ke ekadam baad poochh leta yadi koee to shaayad kah detee pahale hee achchha tha
shaadee na karatee to bhee achchha tha
lekin shikha ke aate hee main sab bhool gaee
arun kee nijee aadaten kaisee bhee ho usane mere parivaar ko sukhee rakhane ke lie sab sahayog diya hai
ek ke baad ek in teenon bachchon ke aane ke baad to mujhe apane aagepeechhe aur kuchh dikhana bhee band ho gaya
mujhe sirph apana parivaar hee dikhane laga
veena ne apanee baat kahee
deedee hamen to ek hee chinta sataatee rahee itane varsh ki aap theek se hain bhee ya nahin
sab aapake man ko samajhate hai
kisee se apana kasht na kahane kee aadat se sab vaakiph hain aur aise mein itana samay beet gaya aapane kabhee aakar mil jaane kee bhee nahee sochee
aise mein sab apanee kalpana se apaneapane tareeke se aapake panon se hisaab lagaate rahe
aap shaadee karake aisee aaeen yahaan kee peechhe ka sab bhool gaeen
vahaan peechhe bhee to aapako yaad karane vaale hain priya bhaavuk ho chalee thee
veena bhee apanee bahan ko sab man kee bata kar santusht karana chaahatee thee
vah bolee samay ne mujhe khushee dee
parivaar diya
mera apana parivaar ban gaya
main apane parivaar kee divaanee ho gaee
mujhe yah khushee badee mushikal se milee thee
yah khushee jo meree apanee thee
mujhe arun kee baaten usake apane parivaar kee baaten bahut bor karatee thee
mujhe usakee aarthik tangee kabhee nahee chubhee
vah bahut samay tak pareshaan raha
mujhe bhee chhotechhote bachcho ko chhodakar kaam par jaana pada
lekin paise kee pareshaanee ko hamane kabhee apane bachcho ke paalan mein aade nahee aane diya
apane maanbaap se mile sanskaaro ne bhee to yahee sikhaaya tha
unheen ke sahaare sab nibhata raha
samay hanseekhushee beetata ja raha hai aur apane bachcho ke saath is duniyaan mein mast tumhaaree deedee ko yah bhee nahin lagata ki vah yahaan doosare kisee desh mein hai
mere lie kanaada aur deharaadoon mein phark nahin kaheen bhee
deedee ke manobhaavo ko jaanakar priya ko khushee huee ki chalo ek baat to achchhee hai kee deedee khush hai
lekin apane parivaar mein mast deedee apane beete dinon ke sab saathee bhool gaee
apane maanbaap ko bhool gaee yah baat priya ko nahee janchee
bolee vah sunakar achchha laga ki deedee aap apane ateet ko bhool gaee
lekin deedee ateet ke dard ko bhoolaana to theek lagata hai apane aaj ko sanvaarane mein aap vyast ho gaee yah bhee theek hai
lekin vahaan mammeedaidee bhee hai
aapake bhaeebahan bhee hai
un sabako kaise bhool gaee aap vah to aaj bhee aap se jude hai
aaj vah bhee isee parivaar ke hee ang hai
unhen bhoola dena kya sambhav hai
priya kee baat sunakar veena ko yaad ho aaee apanee maan
man udakar palabhar mein maan ke paas ja pahuncha
aankhen nam ho aaee
bolee maan ko kaise bhool sakatee hoon
daidee kee bhee bahut yaad aatee hai
tum sabakee bahut yaad aatee hai
lekin apane aaj se lipatee tumhaaree bahan ko un sab yaadon se lipatalipat kar rona achchha nahin lagata
sab bhool jaane kee koshish karatee hoon
isalie nahin kee vah yaad achchhee nahee
sirph isalie ki un yaado se lipat kar jeene se main nishkriy ho jaungee
main unamen khokar apane bachcho ke saath nyaay nahee kar paungee
unhen apanee maan ka chehara bujha sa najar aaega
mere paas to apane parivaar ko paalane ke lie maan ka mool mantr hai
vahee mann mujhe sab bhulae hai
mujhe maan ka vahee rup dikhata hai us mantr mein jab vah ham sab bhaeebahanon ko akele paalatee thee
jab daidee naukaree kee vajah se maheene mein keval ekado din ke lie hee ghar aa paate the
aise mein maan yadi daidee kee kamee ko lekar pareshaan rahatee to kya hamen achchhe sanskaar de sakatee thee veena kahe ja rahee thee
shaayad bahut dinon baad use apane man ke har kone mein simatee baaten sunane vaala koee mila tha mammee kee himmat yaad karake main aur himmat paatee hoon
unhen bhee meree yaad aatee hogee
par chalo unake aasapaas aur sabhee betiyaan hain
unase to mil hee letee hongee
veena ko ab maan bahut yaad aane lagee thee
deedee kee baat sunakar priya mannamugdh nihaaratee rahee kuchh der usen phir bolee deedee
apane bachchon se
yah kartavy hai hamaara
par aap to mujhe lagata hai isase aage kuchh sochatee bhee nahee
are aap jaise apane bachcho ke lie pareshaan rahatee ho vaise mammeedaidee ko bhee to aapakee chinta sataatee hai
unhen bhee to pareshaanee hotee hai
vah bhee to chintit rahate hai
main to yahee kahoongee samay nikaalakar mil kar aao unase
kaise bhee koshish karo
bachche bhee saath jaen aapake
mammeedaidee ke bhee to kitane aramaan hain apane in naatiyon se milane ke kuchh kijie vakt rahate unase mil kar aaeee
tab veena ne kahaan ab banaungee main prograam
krisamis kee chhuttiyaan hogee bachchon kee
aur meree naukaree bhee shaayad pakkee ho jae tab tak
nahin hogee tab bhee banaungee
lekin arun par sab nirbhar karata hai
vah koee na koee bahaana bana dega to man aur duhkhee ho jaega
deedee jeejaajee agar nahee jaana chaahate to aap akele bhee to bachchon ke saath ja sakatee hai
priya ne tab kaha
aisa nahin hai priya main akelee bhee ja sakatee hoon
pahale bhee kaee baar socha hai maine
lekin ekaek koee aisee baat ho jaatee hai ki prograam agale varsh par ja pahunchata hai
na jaane kaisa dar hai arun ke man mein jo ab indiya jaane ke naam par kannee kaat jaata hai
ab to kabheekabhee kahata hai bachche haeeskool kar len
unhen hostal mein daalakar ham indiya hee shipht ho jaenge
tab priya ne kaha aise to vakt beetata jaega
pandrah varsh beet gae das aur beet jaenge
mammeedaidee to yoon hee intajaar karate rahege
daideejee kee hee sochie jara pichaasee varsh ke ho chale hain
kab tak rahenge is jeevan ka kuchh nahee pata
vah to kuchh bolate nahee
kisee ko shikaayat nahee karate
man mein magar aap hee kee sochate rahate hai
mainne dekha hai alamaaree se kaee baar vah akele baithe aapakee aur dev kee elabam nikaal kar tasveeron ko nihaarate rahate hai
koee aa jae to ekaek kah dete hain photo par dhool jam gaee thee saaph kar raha tha
priya kee aankho se barabas aansoo chhalak pade
veena bhee apanee rulaee na rok paee
priya ke saath sisakane lagee
mujhe daidee kee bahut yaad aa rahee hai priya itana samay beet gaya
daidee to bahut boodhe ho chuke honge
maine aisa kabhee nahin socha
mujhe to hamesha se mammee ka chehara hee yaad aaya
nahin yaad kiya sach mein mainne daidee jee ko
hamaare daidee to sant hain
apana dard kisee se nahee kahate
bas man hee man mein magn rahate hai
man mein kya hai unake na ham jaan pae na hee mammee
ham to mammee se bandhe mammee kee duniyaan mein hee mast rahe aur veena phaphakatee rahee
baat vaheen khatm ho gaee
arun va amit jo tahalane gae the ghar laut aae the
veena va priya ko bhaavaano mein lipata dekh kar amit ka man bhee bhar aaya aur arun to veena ke aansoo dekhakar bechain ho gaya
vah kyon ro rahee hai yahee kahata raha baarabaar
shabdon ke bina dard samajhana har kisee ke bas kee baat nahin shaayad
amit kee najar bahut tej thee
samajhane kee shakti usase bhee tej
agale hee din usane mahasoos kiya ki arun ghar se baahar kam hee nikalata hai
yaani kaam ke naam par vah koee kaam nahin karata
aisee soch ekaek use apanee atapatee lagee
lekin socha hai kuchh chaahe atapata chaahe kisee ke lie achchha kisee ke lie bura
ab socha hai to khojana bhee hoga soch ka nateeja jaanana bhee hoga
aap kee chhuttee kis din hotee hai subah naashta karate hee poochh liya amit ne
are bhaee apana kya hai pheeld vark hai jyaada
teleephon par epvaantamennt leta hoon phir jaata hoon
ab agale saat din ke lie sab band
tum log aae ho na aise mein ek saptaah kee pooree chhutee le lee hai
veena bhee nahee jaegee
arun ne kaha
are are aisa mat keejie
aap jarur jaen kaam par
amit ne usakee baat ka utar diya
nahin bhaee isakee jarurat nahin
mai kisee kee naukaree nahee karata
inshyorens aijent hoon
ek saptaah baad kee taareekh phiks kar lee hain
arun jaise apana saara vakt unake saath bitaana chaahata tha
to kya aap ghar se hee saara kaam karate hai amit ne poochha haan
jyaadaatar kaam ghar se hee hota hai
bas kabhee naya koee klaeent mil jae to jaana padata hai
varana to sab kaam phiks hai
arun ne saral shabdon mein bataaya
use to shaayad baatacheet shuru karane ka avasar chaahie tha mai to ab koee naya kaam karana bhee nahin chaahata
baarah saal pahale tak main ek inshyorens kampanee mein mainejar tha
lekin mere neeche doteen gore mere khilaaph the
unhone mujhe jhoonte kes mein phansa diya meree naukaree bhee gaee aur laisens bhee kainsil ho gaya
teen saal lage mujhe kes ladane mein
main jeet gaya
lekin is beech yahee phaisala kar liya ki naukaree nahin karunga kabhee
aur usake baad se main bas praivet kampanee ke lie kaam karata hoon
achchhee kameeshan mil jaatee hai
arun ne apanee baat pooree kee
amit samajh gaya
daal mein kuchh kaala hai
yoon hee bina kuchh poochhe itanee baat kah gaya arun vaastavik kya hogee isaka khulaasa hona jaruree tha
vah poochhane laga usase aap to mainejar kee post par kaam kar chuke hain
kes bhee jeet gae
achchhee khaasee rakam milee hogee aapako harjaane ke rup mein yahaan to suna hai yadi kes jeet jao to itana harjaana milata hai ki jeevan bhar kaam karane kee jarurat nahin rahatee
tab arun ne kaha mere kes mein kuchh aisa nahin tha
kuchh galtiyaan mujhase bhee huee thee isalie hamane milajul kar phaisala kar liya aur badale mein mujhe keval tanakhvaah aur apana laisens vaapis mil gaya
dekho yahaan ke kaayade kaanoon bahut ajeeb hain
kabhee kuchh na karane par bhee hajaaronlaakhon ka phaayada ho jaata hai aur kabhee kuchh bhee kar do to bhee aapako koee nahee poochhata
arun baat badalana chaah raha tha
amit ko bhee laga ki baat kuchh adhik vyaktigat hai
arun se aur adhik poochhega to use bura lag sakata hai
isalie vah arun ka vishay chhod veena se baat karane laga
deedee aap batao amit ne kaha veena se
bhaabhee ke sthaan par deedee shabd ka prayog use pandrah varsh baad bada atapata lag raha tha
lekin bhaabhee ab kah nahin sakata tha aur deedee se jyaada apanepan ka rishta ab aur koee na tha aapakee kya dinacharya hai
main to abhee tak paartataeem jaab karatee hoon
oldaij hom mein
boodhe logon ke lie din bhar ke khaane ka saara meenoo taiyaar karana
unakee agale din kee jaruraton ka khyaal rakhana hee mera kaam hai
utar diya veena ne
lekin paartataeem kyon poochha amit ne
naam ke lie
mujhe ek saptaah mein lagabhag saaton din jaana padata hai
chhuttee hotee hai to bhee kisee saptaah ke beech ke din
darasal meree naukaree usee din hotee hai jab koeenaakoee staaph chhuttee par ho
aur aisa saptaah mein lagabhag chaar din jarur hota hai
isake ilaava shaniravi ko to jarur jaana hai
lekin phir bhee aap use paartataeem kyon kahatee hain amit ne poochha
kyonki mujhe roj paise mil jaate hain aur naukaree ka aur koee bhee phaayada nahee milata
saat saal ho gae hai
ab jarur ummeed lagee hai ki shaayad meree naukaree pakkee ho jae
veena ne sahaj bhaav se utar diya
isaka matalab to yah hua ki aap yadi kuchh din jaane mein asamarth hai to vah kisee aur ko chaans de denge phir poochha amit ne
haan kyon nahee pahalee dileevaree ke baad main ek maheena nahin ja sakee
tab mujhe phir se kaam paane ke lie chhah maheene prateeksha karanee padee
bas phir agalee do baar to main paanchave din hee kaam par chalee gaee
yah shabd kitana dard lie the amit va priya ko ekaek laga
veena apanee apane parivaar kee saaree kahaanee in shabdon mein piro gaee
kah gaee saaree daastaan in shabdon ke sahaare
ek din do din saptaah mein paanch ya chhah din
dinon ke hisaab se naukaree
naukaree karanee pad rahee hai
yah bhee vivashata samajh aa gaee
kyon nahee aatee roj ke roj paise milate hai
gharavaala ghar baitha hai
laeesens hai
lekin jis par kabhee kes chala ho
jisakee naukaree kabhee kes ke kaaran chalee gaee ho aur jo phaisala karake kes se chhoota ho
us par bhala nae log kyon vishvaas karenge kaun karavaega usase inshyorens aur tabhee veena ko kaam karana padata hai apanee dayootee samajh
tabhee sande ho ya mande raat ho ya din kisee bhee samay use dayootee par jaana padata hai
tabhee ek din mein dodo shipht vo kaam karatee hai
aise mein main indiya nahin aa sakatee hee kah sakatee hai
yah to nahee kah sakatee main indiya nahee aa sakatee kyonki mujhe apana parivaar paalana hai
kyonki mujhe teenateen bachchon ka dhyaan rakhana hai
kyonki na keval teen bachchon ka balki apane pati ka dhyaan rakhana hai jo na kaam par jaata hai na hee ghar ke kaam mein haath bantaata hai
bas keval baaten karata hai
uncheeunchee baaten karata hai
sapanon mein rahata hai
hamesha tees saal peechhe chala jaata hai
apane poorvajon kee baat karata hai
kisee raaja kee baat karata hai
us raaja ke vajeer kee baat karata hai
us raaja kee raanee kee baat karata hai
us raanee kee saut kee baat karata hai
us saut ko vah daayan ka darja deta hai
us daayan ko vah apanee or chhuree lekar daudata dekhata hai
aur bas usake aage kuchh nahee
vah dar kar maidaan chhod aaya aur usane yahaan aakar bahut mehanat kee
bahutasee mehanat kee
aaj vah bahutabada ban gaya hai
teen bachchon ka baap unake lie usane bainkabailens chhod diya hai
inshyorens karava dee hai
yadi use kuchh ho gaya to ve aasaanee se padalikh lenge
aur usane sab socha hai aane vaale kal ke lie
ya phir vah sochata hai beete hue kal ke lie usaka aaj kaisa hai usakee use chinta nahee kyonki amit ne paaya ki arun aaj mein to jeeta hee nahee
aaj mein to keval veena hee jeetee najar aaee use
aaj se to veena hee joojhatee najar aaee use
aaj kee har jarurat to veena hee pooree karatee hai
aaj roj hota hai
aaj roj beet jaata hai aur arun keval kal kee baat karata hai beete kal kee ya aane vaale kal kee iseelie to amit se usakee takaraar bhee ho gaee teesare teen
chhotechhote kaatejanuma ghar the sabhee aasapaas
bhaarateey mool ke log bahut hee kam the
saare shahar kee aabaadee shaayad dillee kee kisee ek kaalonee se kam hogee
joon ka maheena aur phoolon kee bahaar
jidhar dekho phool hee phool gahare rang
priya jab dekhatee har baar kahatee dekho inake rang kitane shokh hain
yah gulaab dekho yah guladaudee dekho is delie ko dekho rang kitana khila hai

aur tab amit kahata yahaan ka mausam dekho kitana suhaavana hai aasamaan dekho kitana saaphasvachchhanirmal kabhee dekha hai kya aisa achchha vaataavaran hai to sab sundar hee hoga aur to aur log bade milanasaar lage
shaayad isalie kee bheed dikhatee nahee apane bahut kam hai isalie har kisee ko apana banaane kee chaah mein har raahageer unhen haay hailo jarur karata
do din se yahee sab ho raha tha
subah sab taiyaar hote
naashta karate
baajaar chale jaate
din bhar vindoshaaping ya phir kaheen kuchh pasand aa jaata to khareed lete
arun gaadee chalaata
amit usake saath baithata aur dono bahane va bachche peechhe
veena ke bachche us samay skool gae hote the
bahanon kee baaten apanee thee
bachche to bas bahaar ka najaara dekhane me hee mast rahate
unake lie to yah sapanon ka desh tha
amit kabhee baahar dekhata kabhee kuchh dekhakar arun se jaanakaaree le leta
arun pahale to bahut utsukata ke saath unhen baahar le jaane ko taiyaar dikha
lekin bahanon ne jab teesare din ka prograam usake saamane rakha to vah bola bhee abhee ek din mujhe bhee chaahie
mujhe amit se bahut see baaten karanee hai
mujhe usase bahut see jaanakaaree lenee hai
aise mein main soch raha tha ki aaj ka din ghar mein hee bitaaya jae
ya phir kaar mein baith aaj koee aur baat na bole bas main boloonga aur aap sab sunoge
ekaek aisee shart ko koee jaise taiyaar nahee tha
ye kya hua veena hee bolee dekhie hamen vahee karana chaahie jo ye log chaahen

agar amit ka mood aaj ghoomane jaane ka nahin hai ya keval aapakee hee baat sunane ka hai to hamen kya aitaraaj ho sakata hai lekin rahee kaar mein sirph aapakee baat sunane kee baat to yah bahut kathin shart hai
usase behatar hoga ki aaj ham kaheen na jaen
bachchon ka munh utar gaya
priyaamit to shishtaachaaravash kuchh na bol sake ekaek
kuchh der baad amit ne kaha aisa karate hai abhee kaheen nahin jaate
aaj shaam ko chalenge
jab bachche bhee aa jaenge
sabako saath lekar kaheen dinar karane
baahar dinar na baaba na nau logon kee baaraat ka poora kharcha hamaare ek maheene ka bajat gadabada dega ekaek arun ke munh se aisee baat sunakar sab sakate mein aa gae
ye kya kah gaya
bolee mere paas bahut hai apana jo main apanon par kharch kar sakoon
yadi aap aur bachche mere hai to priya va isaka parivaar bhee utana hee mera hai
ekadam chuppee chha gaee
bilkul chuppee
arun ko jaise saanp soongh gaya
jyaada bolane vaala kabheekabhee aisee baat bol jaata hai jo use apane tak hee rakhanee chaahie
isalie to badebujurg kah gae hai pahale tolo phir bolo
veena ka ekaek phoot padana dekhakar hee amit ne mahasoos kiya ki dhairyasheel veena ke marm ko bahut gahare tak chhoo gaee thee arun kee ye baat
jo pandrah varsh se sah rahee hai kitana kuchh samajh aa raha tha kuchh nahin
kyonki veena to yahee kahatee thee jabatab sab theek hai
lekin ek shabd bhee kabheekabhee kisee kee pooree jeevanee ka darpan ban jaata hai
dard kisee ke dil ko samajhane ke lie poore pandrah varsho kee dastaan jaanana jaruree nahin
main to yoon hee kah gaya
bas jubaan phisal gaee veena itanee jaldee hathiyaar daal dega arun aashchary hua priya ko
aur usakee ruaasee aavaaj sunakar veena bhee ekaek pighal gaee
yah bandhan unhee bhaavanaon ke khilavaad par hee bandha hai amit jaan gaya
veena bhaavuk hai ati bhaavuk usase bhee adhik bhaavuk aur arun usakee is kamajoree ko jaanata hai
baat badal gaya amit tab chalie jeeja jee ham aaj chaay banaate hai aur saath pakaude
baahar laan mein baithakar aaraam sesunenge aapakee kahaanee
